Description:
Our client is a leading key broadband solution brand. They are now looking for an Area Sales Manager to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Maintain and grow sales within structured cabling by providing sales and services.
Maintain effective customer relationships through timely, professional, courteous, and accurate responses.
Must be a subject matter expert in the product line and industry, provide technical assistance and support to customers as needed
Preparing and managing a budget for the territory, utilizing in-house sales forecasting tool.
Provide the reporting Manager with timely information pertaining to product quality issues, training, customer concerns, competitive information, budgetary variances, new prospects, and territory progress against goals.Salary: AED 20000 - AED 25000Skills
Skills:
Experience- 5+ years of field sales experience, most preferably in the structured cabling
Industry
Domain Knowledge-Experienced in optical fiber manufacturing and sales
Education â€“ Graduation in any stream
Language proficiency: Excellent oral and written communication skills in English; Arabic oral skills is a strong preference.
